metadata.name: Lone Walk
metadata.description:
In the historical madrasas in Turkey, there are fountains and pools with continuous flowing water, called the fountain of life. The source of the fountain symbolizes birth, the waterway leading to the pool symbolizes life, and the water collected in the big pool symbolizes death. 
Life is a way people walk alone.

Photographer: Melih Taner Tanyeli  

Edition: Open  

Location: Mardin - Turkey  

Jpeg Size: 3744x5832/300dpi

Licence: Extended Editorial  
Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants.
